### legalizeForInsert() {#ab9434bd7ee08975d3ed2adca806f2096}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::IntervalMapImpl::Path::legalizeForInsert (unsigned Level)"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
legalizeForInsert - Prepare the path for an insertion at Level.

When the path is at end(), node(Level) may not be a legal node. legalizeForInsert ensures that node(Level) is real by moving back to the last node at Level, and setting offset(Level) to size(Level) if required. 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Level">The level where an insertion is about to take place.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/intervalmap-h/#l00919">919</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/intervalmap-h">IntervalMap.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### subtree() {#af6b9bc0a599f8d7071efbe343ffb5c06}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>NodeRef &amp; llvm::IntervalMapImpl::Path::subtree (unsigned Level) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
subtree - Get the subtree referenced from Level.

When the path is consistent, node(Level + 1) == subtree(Level). 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Level">0..height-1. The leaves have no subtrees.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
